item.title: St. Clement Of Rome
item.description: Who Was St. Clement Of Rome? St. Clement Of Rome or Pope Clement was bishop of Rome in the late first century AD.

item.title: St. Ignatius Of Antioch
item.description: Who Was St. Ignatius of Antioch? Ignatius of Antioch also known as Ignatius Theophorus meaning “the God-bearing”), was an early Christian writer and Patriarch of Antioch.

item.title: St. Polycarp of Smyrna
item.description: Who Was St. Polycarp of Smyrna? Polycarp AD 69 – 155 was a Christian bishop of Smyrna.
